Footwork.feedback: Ensure your front foot points towards the cover region.

Head Position.feedback: Keep your head still and over your front knee for better balance.

Swing Control.feedback: A high elbow is key to a good cover drive. Ensure a full swing.

Balance.feedback: Maintain a stable base and good spine angle throughout the shot.

Follow-through.feedback: Complete your swing with a high and full follow-through.
